name: Avery Reiter
text: Amazing costumer service... they don’t mind making special accommodations for pizzas! Always cleanly and friendly :) Tara always helps me out and gives great recommendations for pie toppings.

name: Raymond Halim
text: This is my first time here, the service is good and fast, just for me it's a little undercooked. I should ask for more time to bake. My wife ordered a vegetarian pizza and she liked it

name: Kingsley Douglas
text: I celebrated my PhD last night in this great place. I am glad to say that we enjoyed a fantastic evening and the venue was evidently the reason for that successful evening. The crew  participated in a gorgeous manner, the cuisine was yummy and my buddies were very  joyful. We shall absolutely return for more events. thanks very much.

name: Boone Cross
text: This spot is excellent! Good pricing, big dishes and the staff are always very friendly.

name: Samuel Kennedy
text: I love Blaze so much, it just might be my favorite pizza place.  Their ingredients are super fresh, you can just tell by the taste.  And they’ve got specialty pies that I haven’t found anywhere else.  Just really unique flavor profiles and …More

name: Alice Ellison
text: This is my family’s favorite place to go for a pie because it’s so customizable and everyone can get a little bit of what they want on their half of our pizzas. We always end up with very different styles of pizza which makes for great …More

name: Ben Park
text: Nice workers here.  The build your own pizzas are good and they have so many options to choose from.

name: eric zueger
text: Wow hands down the Best Workers i have found ask for Dylan such a Nice genuine person this place sure knows how to hire employees

name: Chris Rich
text: Love thin crusts  but because of way they cooked (fast fired) expect   burnt bottom.

name: Colin Raparot
text: When my wife and I first started dating she brought me to this place. Skeptical at first but soon changed believer. My goodness the toppings. I was in love with the garlic and white pizza. Best pizza in south orange county!

name: Savannah Maingot
text: My husband and I received a coupon in the mail for a free pizza. We took it in expecting a catch of some kind. But, no catch at all! They gave us a free pizza with unlimited toppings, and whatever crust we wanted! They let us go half and …More

name: Julie Doyel
text: Every time I have been here the manager always greets us and is very friendly. Even when it is really busy, we are always greeted by friendly people.  The pizza is always great and very quick. This visit Drew cooked the pizza perfectly.

name: Chris Kane
text: A somewhat mini version of their stand alone restaurants, but still the same great service and pizza. I want to say that the toppings selection looked smaller, but I still was able to find every one of my regular toppings. Service was great, and you can't beat the price.

name: Cullen Harrell
text: There is this manager there who acts really cool to all the customers like he's some sort of big shot but can't cook a pizza right. A 3 minute pizza turns into a 15 minute issue. Thanks guys.

name: Jasmine Johnston
text: Very good and satisfied. Love there vegan cheese. I will definately come back

name: Celeste Schulze
text: My friend recommended this place to me because they have gluten-free pizza dough. I haven't been able to enjoy a reasonable price GF pizza in Orange County. Selmas pizzeria is the only other place i know that has GF PIZZA dough, and there's …More

name: Iliana Hart
text: I love the taste of the pizzas. Great size, too!! I also thought that the employees here were very friendly!!!

name: kendall eulo
text: pizza was burnt and gross and they barely put the topping of my choice on. also they forgot to cut the pizza into slices which was really irritating.

name: Jalal Moukaddem
text: I love their pizza and most of all the salads they serve

name: Harmonious Joe
text: Can't argue with the 1 size fits all pizza model, especially when they let you go nuts on the toppings at that fixed price point. The kids who work the mall stand are a good bunch, tip the homes when you can!

name: Matthew Velarde
text: Great pizza,unbeatable prices,and friendly staff,what more could you ask for?

name: Liz Arias
text: Great customer service, Jeff was very helpful and kind ...I really love this place!

name: Donny Whitbeck
text: Tastiest pizza pie I've ever had! Each pizza is made just for you with what you want on it.

name: Ketan Kala
text: Excellent Pizza and Fast service. Love it!

name: Mary Tilling
text: The best of the best vegan pizza and great, most awesome professional people are at the Blaze Pizza in Mission Viejo, CA.

name: Isidro Zuniga
text: Happy people happy

name: Nevine Moussa
text: Great pizza

name: Ali Kia
text: I like the customize pizza

name: Cindy Glasier
text: Best pizza of this style

name: Gary Hamblin
text: Great Service!

name: Cesar Hale
text:
(Translated by Google) Very delicious pizza recommended

(Original)
Muy rica pizza recomendado
